title: Documents Needed for Asylum Application

required.passport_id_note: Bring any travel or identification documents you have.
required.application_form_note: You will receive this from the asylum office.
required.photos_note: Bring recent photos that meet ID requirements.

optional.proof_origin_note: Any document showing where you are from (birth certificate, residency card, etc.).
optional.medical_records_note: Bring records of ongoing treatments, prescriptions, or health conditions.
optional.school_work_certificates_note: Evidence of your education or employment history.

warning: ⚠️ Do not worry if you cannot provide all documents. Authorities must still accept and process your asylum request.
